ทำไมราคา XRP จึงปรับตัวขึ้นวันนี้?

Why is the XRP Price Rallying Today?

6h ago//﻿Anjali Belgaumkar
altcoins
AI

Summary

TH

ราคา XRP ปรับตัวขึ้นอย่างแข็งแกร่งในวันศุกร์ที่ผ่านมประมาณ 15% และฟื้นตัวกลับมาอยู่ในระดับ $1.30–$1.40 หลังจากที่ร่วงลงไปกว่า 20% ในช่วงต้นสัปดาห์ การฟื้นตัวครั้งนี้ได้รับแรงหนุนหลักจากการดีดตัวขึ้นทางเทคนิคหลังจากราคาตกเข้าสู่ภาวะขายล้น (Oversold) และความต้องการซื้อที่เพิ่มขึ้นจากนักลงทุนที่เข้ามาเก็บกำไรในราคาต่ำ แม้ว่าตลาดคริปโตโดยรวมจะยังคงได้รับแรงกดดันเล็กน้อย แต่ปริมาณการซื้อขายของ XRP ก็พุ่งสูงขึ้นตามไปด้วย อย่างไรก็ตาม ความผันผวนในตลาดยังคงสูงเนื่องจากการ liquidations มูลค่า 40 ล้านดอลลาร์ และการปลดล็อก 300 ล้านเหรียญ XRP จาก escrow ของ Ripple แม้นักวิเคราะห์บางคนมองว่าระดับราคานี้อาจเป็นพื้นราคาชั่วคราว แต่ก็ยังมีความกังวลเรื่องแนวโน้มระยะสั้นอยู่ โดยมีแนวรับที่สำคัญอยู่ที่ $1.29 หากราคายืนเหนือระดับนี้อาจมีโอกาสเพิ่มขึ้นต่อเนื่อง แต่หากหลุดลงมาอาจทำให้ราคาทดสอบจุดต่ำสุดใหม่อีกครั้ง

EN

XRP experienced a strong recovery on Friday, gaining approximately 15% to trade around $1.30–$1.40, after suffering a 20% decline earlier in the week. The rally was primarily driven by a technical rebound from oversold conditions and increased spot demand from bargain hunters. This recovery occurred alongside rising trading volumes, even as the broader cryptocurrency market faced slight pressure. Despite the rebound, volatility remains high due to recent liquidations totaling $40 million and the scheduled release of 300 million XRP tokens from escrow by Ripple. Market analysts are divided on the near-term outlook, identifying $1.29 as a critical support level. While some believe this could mark a price floor, others warn that failure to hold this level could lead to a retest of recent lows, with bullish targets set significantly higher at $1.85 and $2.20.

Key Points

  • XRP rallied 15% to recover the $1.30–$1.40 range following a 20% drop earlier in the week.
  • The rebound was fueled by technical recovery from oversold levels and bargain buying.
  • Volatility was driven by $40 million in liquidations and the release of 300 million XRP from escrow.
  • Analysts identify $1.29 as a key support level for potential further gains.

Article

The price of XRP rose strongly on Friday after a sharp earlier decline, supported by increased buying activity and a technical rebound from oversold levels. XRP gained roughly 15%, recovering to around $1.30–$1.40, after falling nearly 20% earlier in the week to its lowest level since November 2024. The rebound came even as the broader cryptocurrency market remained under slight pressure. Oversold conditions trigger recovery Market data showed the token had entered deeply oversold territory during the recent sell-off, prompting bargain buying that helped drive the recovery. Trading volumes also increased sharply, indicating strong spot demand as investors stepped in following the decline. Such rebounds are common after rapid price drops, particularly when leveraged positions have already been cleared from the market. Liquidations and supply changes added to volatility Earlier losses were intensified by approximately $40 million in liquidations, which accelerated selling during periods of thin liquidity. Additional pressure came from the scheduled release of about 300 million XRP tokens from escrow by Ripple, temporarily increasing available supply. Mixed outlook for near-term prices Market participants remain divided over the near-term outlook. Some analysts said the rebound could mark the formation of a temporary price floor after the recent correction, while others warned that volatility may persist if broader crypto market sentiment remains weak. Maintaining levels above the $1.29 area could allow further gradual gains, while a renewed drop below that range could lead to another test of recent lows. Analyst EGRAG Crypto said his strategy is to stay positive on the asset if the price moves back above $1.85, which he believes could open the way for a rise toward $2.20. He added that a confirmed move above $2.50 would require a fresh reassessment of the overall market structure. On the downside, he said that if the price falls below $1.28, the position is small enough that he is comfortable continuing to hold it as part of his risk management approach.
